articles.title: India at Paris Olympics 2024, Day 3 Highlights: Satwik-Chirag enter quarter-finals; Paddler Manika in last 16 - Firstpost
articles.description: India at Paris Olympics 2024, Day 3 Highlights: Satwiksairaj Rankireddy and Chirag Shetty become the first Indian men’s doubles pair to qualify for the quarter-finals of an Olympics in badminton.
articles.content:

articles.title: Redmi Pad Pro 5G, Redmi Pad SE 4G Launched With 10,000mAh & 6,650mAh Battery: Price In India, Specifications - ABP Live
articles.description: The Redmi Pad Pro 5G is offered in two versions: Wi-Fi only and Wi-Fi + cellular. The vanilla variant is priced at Rs. 21,999.
articles.content: Redmi on Monday launched Redmi Pad Pro 5G and Redmi Pad SE 4G in India. The Pro variant is the first from the house of Xiaomi to have both Wi-Fi and cellular connectivity. Redmi Pad Pro 5G is powered… [+2845 chars]

articles.title: Virat Kohli lands in Sri Lanka exactly a month after India's T20 World Cup triumph but Gautam Gambhir reunion halted - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Virat Kohli has arrived in Sri Lanka ahead of India's ODI series starting August 2. | Crickit
articles.content: The GOAT has landed. At least that is what the internet is buzzing with. Virat Kohli, exactly a month removed from India's iconic T20 World Cup win, arrived in Sri Lanka for the three-match ODI serie… [+2975 chars]
